data.meta_description: Begin your meal with a comforting bowl of piping-hot soup or a fresh green salad at BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse. Explore our whole menu here.

first_category_block.content:
BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse Soups & Salads: Sublime Starters and Comforting Classics

Whether it's the beginning of a big, delicious meal or the perfect portion for a light lunch, soup and salad is an American restaurant classic. We've got a variety of hearty soups and fresh, crisp salads to choose from. There's something for everyone to enjoy, including vegetarian, vegan-friendly and low-calorie options!

Our motto is: Craft Matters®. That includes our soups and salads, made with the finest ingredients. Look for fresh chunks of avocado in our Chicken Tortilla Soup, hearty and nutritious ancient grains in our Vegan Lentil with Ancient Grains Soup and our chili is like nobody else's, thanks to a sauce simmered with our very own Piranha® Pale Ale. Bold and innovative flavors abound! Get a cup to pair with your meal, upgrade to a bowl for bigger appetites or choose a bread bowl and make it a meal unto itself. Our house salads are always made fresh to complement our soups or anything else from our huge, exciting menu.

If you're looking at our side salads, but feeling a little hungrier, don't forget to check out our entree salads! They're still crisp and light but even more filling with delicious, flaky salmon, crispy fried chicken or tender barbeque chicken.

A Fantastic Meal from Start to Finish at BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse

We hope our soups and salads will be just the beginning of your experience at BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse, whether you complete the meal with some iconic Deep Dish Pizza or a Slow-Roasted entree, or keep things light with one of our EnLIGHTened Favorites. No matter your tastes or unique dietary sensitivities, you're sure to find many new favorites on our menu that'll keep you coming back again and again.

When you do, be sure to sign up for BJ's Premier Rewards PLUS. You'll get access to special offers, a free birthday Pizookie®. Best of all, you'll start earning points immediately for every dollar you spend at your local BJ's, or any of our 200+ nationwide locations.

data.food_warnings_content:
2000 calories a day is used for general nutrition advice, but calorie needs vary. 1,200 to 1,400 calories a day is used for general nutrition advice for children ages 4-8 years and 1,400 to 2,000 calories a day for children ages 9-13 years, but calorie needs vary. Additional nutrition information available upon request.

Menu items with an asterisk (*) contain raw or undercooked ingredients.

Not all ingredients are listed on the menu. All specific weights are pre-cooked weights.

Notice: Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have a medical condition.

Menu items may contain eggs, fish, milk, peanuts, crustacean shellfish, soy, tree nuts and wheat. See full menu for additional information on allergens.

WARNING: Certain foods and beverages sold or served here can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide in many fried or baked foods, and mercury in fish, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/restaurant.
